thread.title: Trump Tweet on Violent Berkeley Protest Raises Question Over Funding
thread.title_full: Trump Tweet on Violent Berkeley Protest Raises Question Over Funding - WSJ

author: Douglas Belkin
title: Trump Tweet on Violent Berkeley Protest Raises Question Over Funding

organizations.name: trump tweet on violent berkeley protest
uc berkeley protests force cancellation of breitbart writer

text:
Hours after violent protests forced officials at the University of California, Berkeley, to cancel an appearance by a right-wing speaker, President Donald Trump early Thursday appeared to threaten the university’s federal support.
“If U.C. Berkeley does not allow free speech and practices violence on innocent people with a different point of view—NO FEDERAL FUNDS?” Mr. Trump said in a message posted on Twitter.
After Mr.... RELATED VIDEO Violent UC Berkeley Protests Force Cancellation of Breitbart Writer's Talk Officials at the University of California, Berkeley canceled the appearance of a right-wing provocateur, Breitbart News Network writer Milo Yiannopoulos, on Wednesday after protesters swarmed the campus, lighted fires and smashed windows.
